title: Have You Heard Our New Song?
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Everyone, look. People who’ve heard our new song are posting about it on social media.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oh wow! They’re saying they love it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That’s so nice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>They love the song as much as we do!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I really want to perform this song in front of everyone soon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Let’s sing~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>We have the choreography down already!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Of course! But we’re going to keep improving it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yup! Today’s club activity will be to practice the choreography for this song!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Let’s do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hey, there’s one part I want to discuss...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Say anything you want. I’m up for any challenge.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Mia-san, you’re so cool!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wha... I wasn’t trying to sound cool or anything!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>We know, we know~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hey Ayumu! Why are you petting me!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I want to pet Mia-chan too...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I guess it can’t be helped... But only a little.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’ll give you a hug~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>E-enough! Stop!!! We’re practicing! Karin, you had something to discuss, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>B-before that, could your big sister pet you too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Nooooo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
